languages.text: "...Величие будет узрето и познано. Отчаяние будет рождено и испробовано. Все жалкие порождения будут изничтожены с нашим явлением".

traits.locale_text: "...Познав величие своих истинных господ, галактика падет. Народ некронов пробудился".

languages.text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."
languages.original_text: "...Величие будет узрето и познано. Отчаяние будет рождено и испробовано. Все жалкие порождения будут изничтожены с нашим явлением".

traits.locale_text: "…Greatness will be seen and known. Despair will be born and tasted."
"…Greatness will be seen and known. Despair will be born and tasted."
"...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."
"…Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured."
"...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."
"...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."

languages.text: «... La grandeza se dará a conocer y nacerá la desesperación, que será degustada. Toda alimaña será aniquilada a nuestro paso».
languages.original_text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."

traits.locale_text: «... La grandeza se dará a conocer y nacerá la desesperación, que será degustada. Toda alimaña será aniquilada a nuestro paso».

languages.text: « ... La grandeur sera vue et connue. Le désespoir naîtra et sera savouré. La vermine sera éradiquée sur notre passage. »
languages.original_text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."

traits.locale_text: « ... La grandeur sera vue et connue. Le désespoir naîtra et sera savouré. La vermine sera éradiquée sur notre passage. »

languages.text: 「…偉大さを目の当たりにし、知るのだ。絶望が生まれ、味わうのだ。我が途上にありしあらゆる害獣は駆逐される」
languages.original_text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."

traits.locale_text: 「…偉大さを目の当たりにし、知るのだ。絶望が生まれ、味わうのだ。我が途上にありしあらゆる害獣は駆逐される」

languages.text: “……世界将会见证伟大，理解伟大。绝望将会诞生，被所有人品尝。所有害虫都会在我们手中灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."

traits.locale_text: “……世界将会见证伟大，理解伟大。绝望将会诞生，被所有人品尝。所有害虫都会在我们手中灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text: "... Größe wird bestaunt und gekannt. Verzweiflung wird geboren und ausgekostet. Alles Ungeziefer wird von uns ausgelöscht."
languages.original_text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."

traits.locale_text: "Wahre Größe wird bestaunt werden, gekannt werden. Verzweiflung wird geboren werden, ausgekostet werden."

languages.text: "...Görülecek ve bilinecek şey görkem olacak. Izdırap doğacak ve sonuna kadar tadılacak. Gelişimizle birlikte tüm iğrenç istilacılar yok olacak."
languages.original_text: "...Greatness will be beheld and known. Despair will be born and savoured. All verminous spawn will be eradicated in our wake."
